titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for observation of the thirtieth day of January as a day of fast and humiliation according to the late act of Parliament for that purpose
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the twenty fifth day of January in the twelfth year of our reign one thousand six hundred and sixty."
Imperfect: faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
